H0.text: Which ship did Drake command against the Spanish Armada. Golden Hind

H1.text: Which ship did Drake command against the Spanish Armada. Ark Royal

H2.text: Which ship did Drake command against the Spanish Armada. Triumph

H3.text: Which ship did Drake command against the Spanish Armada. Revenge
